channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: Your occasional reminder that for Republicans, freedom means the freedom to oppress other people. https://t.co/wDDqORPEyM

@ColemanRidge @ZachWeiner Heinlein has become this weird mix of genres: What if a pre-iPhone civilization made it to space with their slide rules and print magazines?
@ColemanRidge @ZachWeiner The very plot of Podkayne on Mars is set into motion because the magazines in the waiting room are boring. If she lived in the 21st century, she’d be watching TikTok on her phone and avoided a whole book’s worth of trouble.
@SeerSnively @ColemanRidge @ZachWeiner But he didn’t tell his readers that for another decade or so. You might say he was playing the long game.

@JBJones72 @ZachWeiner I suspect some of his puzzle books hold up, as well as classics like 1, 2, 3… Infinity. https://t.co/PqqYyqtZ90
@JBJones72 @ZachWeiner However, one should always review any media older than your kid through their eyes, a fact I discovered the hard way when I showed my tween daughter Captain Kirk’s Star Trek.
@trekonomics You mean the network owned by an oligarch with a Chinese ex-wife? https://t.co/lOT0e689gh
@EladNehorai Imagine not noticing that this is the theme of almost every animated kids movie and has been since Disney had the genre to itself.
@trekonomics Must be desperate if they’re willingly to do publicly burn an asset.

We need a new 19 Letters, written to a young baal teshuva, empathetic to their desire for community and purpose, but warning of the cost of swearing fealty to an authoritarian system incapable of self-reflection and change. https://t.co/Xp6Pkrjki0
@EladNehorai Happy almost-second anniversary to this piece by an op-ed columnist being elevated as an ethical thinker by Yeshiva University. https://t.co/Ssk5IZxUo3
@Baalbatish1 @DemocraticLuntz Far less memable! https://t.co/BO3BpUdrXr
@EladNehorai By the 1970s, people had forgotten why most Jews had fled Orthodoxy when they left Europe. Now we’re relearning it the hard way.
@swordsjew https://t.co/r8ZhWwoLAN

Wait until you hit your 50s, kids. https://t.co/FBALD5RtHo
Remember: Friends don’t let friends succumb to entropy.

@Daroff So what’s your plan? The former guy listened to Bibi, pulled out from JCPOA, and Iran predictably increased enrichment.
@Daroff Do you suggest that the U. S. should declare war on Iran if they don’t denuclearize?
Your occasional reminder that Texas Republicans have imposed restrictions on the state’s doctors that are in clear violation of Jewish religious law. https://t.co/j1DATCdFt1

Your occasional reminder that being relentlessly wrong is not an obstacle in the Yeshiva University community. https://t.co/pSZTRSqzvR
Here’s a fun takedown of Bret “bedbug” Stephens, who is also being hosted by the @92Y in the near future. https://t.co/CHgsiDRUGt
@datadivajf Shavua Tov!
@MitchSchindler The question is how to organize without, and sometimes despite, the Party, which has convinced itself that silence is the best policy in the face of a rising fascist tide.
Recruited by Don Was to play acoustic guitar for re-recording of classic songs. Fascinating portrait of Bob as an impatient perfectionist. https://t.co/XYKodDG8gz

Important post highlighting multiple policy failures by multiple Orthodox schools. https://t.co/VwmuNl6KVN
Also, a useful rejoinder to those who would argue that Talmud study is “substantively equivalent” to any form of practical education.

@MattNegrin @froomkin No. Because fascists are part of the community of “people like us and therefore fundamentally good” for their owners and advertisers and many of the editors and writers the owners hire.
@MattNegrin @froomkin The fundamental mistake is thinking that the Times et al are fundamentally different than, say, a parochial Jewish newspaper with multiple affiliation to established Jewish institutions.
@BenYehudaPress Big fan of the double yod symbol — does it have its own name?

Very cool to see. https://t.co/8DDZJkjpbD
I interviewed @yael_kanarek about her Regendered Bible project last year: https://t.co/YxL8lCTrn9

Looking forward to @RabbiShmuley / Ted Nugent summit. https://t.co/j9J2OpF1cK
Reminder: https://t.co/K53wOonb9l
